caption.center: BRIAN DEMPSEY, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the circuit court for Escambia County. Michael G. Allen, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
John M. Kvartek of Clark, Partington, Hart, Larry, Bond Stackhouse, Pensacola, for Appellant.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General; Joshua R. Heller, Trisha Meggs Pate, Felicia A. Wilcox, and Carolyn J. Mosley, Assistant Attorneys General, Tallahassee, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
ALLEN, WEBSTER, and PADOVANO, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED.
